text: Susan Haydn Thomas (4 May 1947 â€“ 8 August 2015), better known as Susan Sheridan, was a British actress. She was born in Newcastle, England. Her voice acting roles included Noddy in the Cosgrove Hall/BBC Television series Noddy's Toyland Adventures, Princess Sylvia in Muzzy in Gondoland, Trillian in the radio series The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy and Princess Eilonwy in the animated movie The Black Cauldron. Sheridan died at home in London on 9 August 2015, aged 68. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1985 The Black Cauldron Princess Eilonwy Voice 2000 Eisenstein Wedding Official Voice ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official website Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:People from Newcastle upon Tyne
title: Susan Sheridan
